title: The Asset Allocator: Mebane Faber - All-Time Highs Are ‘Nothing To Be Afraid Of’
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: ETF manager, author and popular investment blogger Mebane Faber covers a wide range of asset-allocation issues from buy-and-hold to global value investing. In this podcast (20:51), Faber sees asset allocation from the standpoint of market history, and insightfully addresses the difference between becoming rich and staying rich. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
